name: mail-shield-ai
description: Root package to run MailShield AI backend and frontend concurrently

scripts.dev: npm run sync:env && concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd dashboard && pnpm install && cd ../dashboard-backend && ./.venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
